      • setEvent

        public boolean setEvent(int time,
                        java.lang.String eventID)
        Setter for the event in a certain time slot. Just a simple method, shouldn't be used directly. Please use the addEvent and removeEvent method.
        Parameters:
        time - The time to set the event.
        eventID - The ID of the event.
        Returns:
        A boolean which determines the event is set of not.

      • addEvent

        public boolean addEvent(int time,
                        java.lang.String eventID,
                        int lastingTime)
        Add a event to the timeslot. Will return false if the end time is larger than 17 or the time slot is already occupied.
        Parameters:
        time - The beginning time of the event.
        eventID - The ID of the event.
        lastingTime - The lasting time of the event.
        Returns:
        A boolean which determines whether the event is added of not.

      • removeEvent

        public boolean removeEvent(java.lang.String eventID)
        Remove an event from the whole time slot.
        Parameters:
        eventID - The ID of the event to remove
        Returns:
        return true if the event is removed, return false if there is no such event in the time slot.

      • clearTimeSlot

        public void clearTimeSlot()
        Clear's timeslot by mapping it to 0

      • checkAvailability

        public boolean checkAvailability(int time,
                                 int lastingTime)
        Sees if a certain timeslot is available
        Parameters:
        time: - what time it might be available at
        lastingTime: - how long the timeslot is
        Returns:
        true if and only if that time slot is available
